name: trailarr
description: Trailarr is a self-hosted utility that syncs and manages media requests between Trakt and Arr-based media managers, helping keep watchlists and automation rules aligned.
features: Trakt integration: Sync watchlists and collections from Trakt to your media automation setup.
Arr synchronization: Automatically add items from Trakt to Radarr, Sonarr, or other Arr applications.
Watchlist monitoring: Monitor Trakt watchlists for new additions and sync them to media managers.
Bidirectional sync: Keep Trakt and Arr applications in sync with changes reflected in both directions.
Collection management: Sync Trakt collections to ensure your media library matches your curated lists.
Automatic updates: Run synchronization on a schedule to keep everything up to date without manual intervention.
Filtering rules: Define rules to control which items get synced based on criteria like rating or genre.
Status tracking: Monitor sync status and see which items have been successfully added or skipped.
Multiple profiles: Support multiple Trakt accounts or Arr instances for complex setups.
Web interface: Configure and monitor synchronization through a straightforward web interface.
Notification support: Receive alerts when new items are synced or errors occur.
Lightweight operation: Run continuously with minimal resource usage for automated synchronization.
